titleStmt.title: Good counsells for the peace of reformed churches by some reverend and learned bishops and other divines ; translated out of Latine.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
Davenant, John, ca. 1572-1641.
Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield for William Webb,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dury. cf. Madan 997.
Includes essays by John Davenant, Thomas Morton, Joseph Hall, Ussher, and French divines.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
